text: Klaus Haertter (born 22 July 1952) is a German fencer. He competed for East Germany at the 1976 and 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:People from Lauchhammer Category:German male fencers Category:Sportspeople from Brandenburg Category:Olympic fencers of East Germany Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Universiade medalists in fencing Category:Universiade silver medalists for East Germany Category:Medalists at the 1977 Summer Universiade Category:Medalists at the 1979 Summer Universiade
title: Klaus Haertter
